alert.note: Alert for Coastal Lee; Inland Lee (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 11 at 4:39PM EDT by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of central Lee County through 530 PM EDT... At 439 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Pine Manor to North Naples. Movement was west at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Cape Coral, Fort Myers, Bonita Springs, Matlacha, Harlem Heights, Lochmoor Waterway Estates, Iona, Cypress Lake, Pine Island Center, San Carlos Park, McGregor, Pine Manor, Lovers Key State Park, Matlacha Isles-Matlacha Shores, Pineland, St. James City, Villas, Three Oaks, East Dunbar and Saint James City. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
